Self.Wiki: Defines the stats for a given enemy or group of enemies. Does not determine model or location.\nStats are often affected greatly by attached SpEffects.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

enAutoRecoveryControlParamID.Wiki: The ENAutoRecoveryControlParam parameter to use for this character.

deadMoveForceRate.Wiki: The influence rate to apply to the corpse ragdoll for this character.

nameId.Wiki: The name to display for this entity. Only appears on the health bar of c0000 characters.

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Used to determine the action parameters to use for this enemy.

hitHeight.Wiki: Vertical radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitRadius.Wiki: Horizontal radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitYOffset.Wiki: The vertical offset of the character's hitbox. Will cause them to float.

defeatScore.Wiki: The amount of misson score that this character gives at the time of death.

itemLotId_1.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_2.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_3.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_4.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_5.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_6.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

humanityLotId.Wiki: The humanity item lot to use for humanity rewards upon this character's death.

spEffectID0.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID1.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID2.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID3.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID4.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID5.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID6.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID7.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character that only applies on NG+ and higher. Used to scale enemy stats for each NG+ journey.

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Kinetic damage taken when this character is guarding.

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Energy damage taken when this character is guarding.

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Explosive damage taken when this character is guarding.

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Coral damage taken when this character is guarding.

animIdOffset.Wiki: A value to offset animation IDs by. 0 = a00, 10000 = a01, etc.

moveAnimId.Wiki: The movement animation to use for this character.

spMoveAnimId1.Wiki: The special movement animation to use for this character.

spMoveAnimId2.Wiki: The special movement animation to use for this character.

networkWarpDist.Wiki: The distance at which to warp this character instead of allowing standard movement during network synchronization.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: A value to offset animation IDs by. 0 = a00, 10000 = a01, etc.

partsDamageRate1.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate2.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate3.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate4.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate5.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate6.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate7.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate8.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

weakPartsDamageRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the weak point part.

superArmorRecoverCorrection.Wiki: The change to apply to poise recovery speed for this character.

superArmorBrakeKnockbackDist.Wiki: The knockback distance for the stagger when this character's poise is broken.

stamina.Wiki: The maximum stamina for this character.. Used for non c0000 enemies blocking in DS1

staminaRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: The recovery speed for stamina for this character.

def_phys.Wiki: The flat Kinetic damage defense this character possess.

def_slash.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat Kinetic defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_blow.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat Kinetic defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_thrust.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat Kinetic defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_mag.Wiki: The flat Energy damage defense this character possess.

def_fire.Wiki: The flat Explosive damage defense this character possess.

def_thunder.Wiki: The flat Coral damage defense this character possess.

defFlickPower.Wiki: Innate deflection defense. Deflected attacks can have their damage reduced via flickDamageCutRate

resist_burn.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_stun.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_highPlasma.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_curse.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

ghostModelId.Wiki: The model ID to use for the wandering ghost version of this character.

normalChangeResouceId.Wiki: The resource ID to use for the normal texture.

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding (horizontal direction). In degrees.

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

superArmorDurability.Wiki: The amount of poise this character has. Requires dmgLevel to be set to function properly.

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: The resource ID to use for the character texture.

dropType.Wiki: Determines behavior and appearance of dropped items.

isFloorActivateWait.Wiki: If ON, this character is subject to invalidation due to floor detection.

knockbackParamId.Wiki: The parameters to use for knockback.

fallDamageDump.Wiki: The dampening rate to apply to fall damage suffered.

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: The amount to reduce stamina damage by when received by the character.

pcAttrB.Wiki: The amount to add to Black World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrW.Wiki: The amount to add to White World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrL.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrR.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

areaAttrB.Wiki: The amount to add to Black World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrW.Wiki: The amount to add to White World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrL.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrR.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

mpRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: The speed at which mana points are restored for this character.

defaultLodParamId.Wiki: The default LOD parameter to use for this character.

drawType.Wiki: The draw type used for this character. Normally affects the shader used.

npcType.Wiki: The character type assigned to this character.

teamType.Wiki: The team type assigned to this character.

moveType.Wiki: The move type assigned to this character.

lockDist.Wiki: Additional maximum lock-on distance added onto base distance defined in LockCamParam

materialSe_Weak1.AltName: Defense Presentation: Sound (on Weak Point Damage)
materialSe_Weak1.Wiki: The sound used when weak point is damaged.

materialSfx_Weak1.AltName: Defense Presentation: Particle (on Weak Point Damage)
materialSfx_Weak1.Wiki: The particles used when weak point is damaged.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Determines if weak parts (such as the head) will be affected by all attacks or just arrow attacks.\nHeadshot animation will be used for weak part attacks if it exists.

forwardUndulationLimit.Wiki: The upper limit angle when adjusting the front and rear angles to match the undulations. If the overall length is long, it is better to set it lower. (If there is a FootIK, the FootIK value will be used.). Requires isUnduration

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, the guard animation offset to use when being attacked.

burnSfxType.Wiki: The particle type to use when burning.

burnGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

stunGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

highPlasmaGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

curseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

parryAttack.Wiki: The attack power value to use when calculating a parry as the parrying side.

parryDefence.Wiki: The defense power value to use when calculating a parry as the parried side.

sfxSize.Wiki: The size of the particles used by this character.

pushOutCamRegionRadius.Wiki: The collision radius for the character in which a camera is pushed away.

hitStopType.Wiki: Determines how enemy is affected by hitstop.

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: The offset to apply when determining the top of a ladder (if this character is climbing). In 1/10 metres.

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: The offset to apply when determining the top of a ladder (if this character is climbing). In 1/10 metres.

useRagdollCamHit.AltName: Is Ragdoll Collision valid for Camera Collision
useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: If ON, then the character's ragdoll can collide with a camera.

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If ON, rigid cloth collision is ignored for this character.

useRagdoll.Wiki: If ON, then ragdoll is used for character to character collision. If false, hitRadius and hitHeight are used instead

isWeakA.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakA_DamageRate.

isGhost.Wiki: If ON, character is treated as a ghost.

isNoDamageMotion.AltName: Ignore Damage Motion for Dummy Hits
isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: If ON, damage level motion is ignored if the damage suffered is 0.

isUnduration.Wiki: If ON, enemies will rotate vertically on slopes. Rotation angle determines by maxUndurationAng

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: If ON, character is valid for the wandering ghost feature.

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: If ON, then the character's head will oscillate.

disableRespawn.Wiki: If ON, the character will not reset position and behavior when the player rests at a bonfire.

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: If ON, movement animation will continue during other animations.

isCrowd.Wiki: If ON, this character is considered a crowd character and will use a reduced profile when multiple characters are present.

isWeakB.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakB_DamageRate.

isWeakC.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakC_DamageRate.

isWeakD.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakD_DamageRate.

doesAlwaysUseSpecialTurn.Wiki: Always execute a special turn (even if there is no navigation mesh at the turn destination, the special turn is continuously executed)

vowType.Wiki: The pledge type used by this character.

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If true, dead enemies will be alive again when the game is reset without respawning enemies (such as quitting to menu)

isHitRumble.Wiki: If ON, character vibrates when hit. Use when you want to change from a normal hit stop, such as a dead person.

isSmoothTurn.Wiki: If ON, perform interpolation when turning between nodes in route movement

isWeakE.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakE_DamageRate.

isWeakF.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with weakF_DamageRate.

modelDispMask16.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask17.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask18.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask19.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask23.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask24.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask25.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask26.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask27.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask28.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask29.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask30.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask31.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

itemSearchRadius.Wiki: The radius to be added as a correction to the cylinder radius of normal Item search judgment (applicable to enemy drop items. Used for large characters etc.)

chrHitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

specialTurnType.Wiki: The special turning type to apply for this character.

isBulletOwner_byObject.Wiki: If ON, this character becomes the owner of a bullet; a flag that applies the object's damage calculation related to the bullet. Used for damage correction by power.

isUseLowHitFootIk.AltName: Use FootIK Filter for Low Collision
isUseLowHitFootIk.Wiki: If ON, use the FootIk filter for low collision.

isNpcPlayerCalculatePvPDamage.Wiki: If ON, calculate damage as a player when calculating damage.

isIntegrateRaycastCheckRoof.Wiki: A flag that determines the ceiling height before making a lift judgment, taking into account that the ceiling is low, rather than a fixed lift of 30 cm when integrating (judging lifted floor). Note that this increases the processing load.

isDisableIntegrateWithRaycast.Wiki: Disable lifting/suction. If you disable it, climbing up 1.5m steps will not work, but capsule movement should be almost problem-free. If it is enabled, it seems that the suction process may cause you to go out of the map.

isHugeEnemy.Wiki: If ON, is considered a huge enemy.

isLegacyBoss.Wiki: If ON, is considered a legacy boss.

def_dark.Wiki: The flat Dark damage defense this character possess.

threatLv.Wiki: Threat level. If it is 0, even if the Player is found, FE that seems to be found is not displayed.

specialTurnDistanceThreshold.Wiki: Make a special turn when the distance to the target is greater than or equal to the set threshold

autoFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The SFX identifier used in the automatic foot effect. (ZZZ of XYYZZZ)

materialSe_Weak2.AltName: Defense Presentation: Sound (on Weak Point Damage)
materialSe_Weak2.Wiki: The sound used when weak point is damaged.

materialSfx_Weak2.AltName: Defense Presentation: Particle (on Weak Point Damage)
materialSfx_Weak2.Wiki: The particles used when weak point is damaged.

spEffectID8.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID9.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID10.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID11.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID12.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID13.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID14.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID15.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

autoFootEffectDecalId.Wiki: The decal ID to apply for footstep SFX. Floor material is taken into consideration alongside this ID.

toughness.Wiki: The base toughness value this character has.

toughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: The correction to apply to the base toughness recovery rate for this character.

neutralDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Kinetic.

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Slash.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Strike.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Thrust.

magicDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Energy.

fireDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Explosive.

thunderDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Coral.

darkDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Dark.

darkGuardCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to incoming damage if the damage type is Dark and this character is guarding.

clothUpdateOffset.Wiki: The distance offset to use for the cloth update check for this character. In metres.

npcPlayerWeightType.Wiki: The equipment load type to apply to player-like characters.

normalChangeModelId.Wiki: The character ID To use when replacing the model (ChrBND) and textures (TexBND) used by this character.

normalChangeAnimChrId.Wiki: The character ID To use when replacing the animations (AniBND) used by this character.

paintRenderTargetSize.Wiki: The paint render target size for this character. In pixels.

DamageMaterialThreshold.Wiki: The damage threshold at which the damage material changes. 0 is 0% damage, 100 is 100% damage.

sideUndulationLimit.Wiki: The maximum angle when adjusting the left-right angles during undulations. If the total length is long, it is better to set this lower. (If there is a FootIK, the FootIK value will be used.)

SfxResBankId.Wiki: The particle resource bank to use for this character. -1 means the bank with the same character ID as this character is used.

phantomShaderId.Wiki: The overlay shader to apply to this character.

multiPlayCorrectionParamId.Wiki: The multiplayer correction parameters to use for this character.

maxAnklePitchAngle.Wiki: The ankle pitch limit used during FootIK (-1 no limit).

resist_depletedUraniumToxic.Wiki: The flat defense value of this character for the specified resistance type.

depletedUraniumToxicGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when this character is guarding.

teamTypeByGiantNut.AltName: Team Type: Giant Nut Seed Change
teamTypeByGiantNut.Wiki: The team type this character follows after a Giant Nut Seed change has been applied.

lockCameraParamId.Wiki: The lock-on camera parameters to use for players that target this character.

spEffectID16.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID17.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID18.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID19.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID20.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID21.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID22.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID23.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID24.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID25.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID26.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID27.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID28.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID29.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID30.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID31.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

disableLockOnAng.Wiki: Create a conical area beneath this character based on the specificed angle. Prevents player lock-on. Can be changed temporarily from TAE.

clothOffLodLevel.AltName: LOD Level to Disable Cloth Processing
clothOffLodLevel.Wiki: The LOD level at which to turn off Havok Cloth processing.

movementType.Wiki: The movement control type to use for this character.

estusFlaskRecoveryParamId.Wiki: When this character dies, this flask recovery is applied to the player.

roleNameId.Wiki: Specify the role name at the time of summoning. -1 Use the default role name of the target spirit body. 0 No display. 1 or more Used as a text ID.

estusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: HP / MP est recovery probability when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

hpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

mpEstusFlaskLotPoint.Wiki: Recovery probability of MP Est when defeating an enemy. The numerator is obtained from the NPC para with 10000 as the denominator.

estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP/FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
estusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: Next time probability increase value when you miss the HP / MP est recovery lottery. Addition value of numerator.

hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed HP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
hpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when you miss the HP Est Recovery Lottery. Addition value of numerator.

mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.AltName: Missed FP Flask Recovery - Bonus Chance
mpEstusFlaskRecovery_failedLotPointAdd.Wiki: The next probability increase value when the MP est recovery lottery is missed. Addition value of numerator.

WanderGhostPhantomId.Wiki: Phantom shader with ID specified only on the guest side Specify the phantom shader ID and make it an illusion

movementTypeParamId.Wiki: Determines movement specifics, such as what types of movement can be made and various speeds.

hacking_EnduranceValue.Wiki: How long it takes to hack this entity, in frames

isNoImpactPlayerMove.Wiki: Does it not impede player movement?

isPredictionShootMasterBase.Wiki: Whether to use Master Base for predictive shot prediction when aiming at this NPC

isUseTankMove.Wiki: Set to enable tank controls (wheel animations, tilt on slopes, etc)

isUseDeadRagdoll.Wiki: Check this box if you want to turn a boss into a ragdoll when its rigid body mass is set to 0 (upon death)

isPushOutCamRegionRadius.Wiki: Whether to enable camera extrusion by camera extrusion area radius

staminaGuardDef_InGuardRelease.Wiki: Stamina attack cut rate while guard is released

SAGuardCutRate.Wiki: SA attack cut rate while guarding

SAGuardCutRate_InGuardRelease.Wiki: SA attack cut rate while guard is released

physGuardCutRate_InGuardRelease.Wiki: Damage attack reduction rate while guard is released

isVisibleEnemySearchStateFE.Wiki: Whether to display the enemy detection status FE displayed above the enemy's head

minimapIconType.Wiki: Type of icon to display on the minimap

DeadLockOnDisableWaiteFrame.Wiki: Number of frames to wait before disabling locks on death

SA_DurabilityRecoveryBase.Wiki: SA basic recovery amount, in points

RecoverSpStartDrainAfterSec.Wiki: The time it takes for stamina to recover after decreasing, in seconds

EnemyScanEventFlagId.Wiki: Info to disclose when this entity is scanned

EnemyScanTextId.Wiki: Text to display when entity is scanned

receiveDmgHitStopType.Wiki: Whether to perform hitstop processing when receiving damage

npcMaterialId.Wiki: Material parameter ID for expressing different coloring, etc.. the last four numbers in NpcMaterialParam entries are this value

coverActionWidthLength.Wiki: Detection distance for left/right cover action judgement

coverActionHeightLength.Wiki: Detection distance for vertical cover action judgement

coverActionCoverLength.Wiki: Cover action cover determination trigger distance

operationPartsCategory.Wiki: Offset of the operation permission type.

jumpEdgeCapDist_FindPath.Wiki: Meters to an edge horizontally for the AI to consider it jumpable.

jumpEdgeCapHeight_FindPath.Wiki: Meters to an edge vertically for the AI to consider it jumpable.

loadAssetId.Wiki: The asset ID to load when loading this entity (for dynamic character generation)

RetargetReferenceChrId.Wiki: Character ID to refer to when specifying an animation retarget

deathAnimType_GroundNormal_RandNum.Wiki: Number of possible random ground death animations.

deathAnimType_GroundLol.Wiki: Death animation type when staggered on land

deathAnimType_GroundFast.Wiki: Death animaton type when at high speeds on land

deathAnimType_GroundBlow.Wiki: Death animation type when knocked off the ground

deathAnimType_FlyNormal_RandNum.Wiki: Number of possible random flying death animations.

deathAnimType_FlyLol.Wiki: Death animation type when staggered in flight

deathAnimType_FlyFast.Wiki: Death animaton type when at high speeds in flight

deathAnimType_FlyBlow.Wiki: Death animation type when knocked off the flying state

deathAnimType_HoverNormal_RandNum.Wiki: Number of possible random hovering death animations.

deathAnimType_HoverLol.Wiki: Death animation type when staggered while hovering

deathAnimType_HoverFast.Wiki: Death animaton type when at high speeds while hovering

deathAnimType_HoverBlow.Wiki: Death animation type when knocked off the hovering state

chrBehAnimFourDirTurnRate.Wiki: The ratio of the apparent turning speed of the forward/left/right animation of ChrBehavior

undulationCorrectGain.Wiki: Speed of adjusting angle to match undulations (overridden by FootIK, if present)

paGaugeMax.Wiki: Upper limit for Pulse Armor health

paGaugeRecoverPerSec.Wiki: PA Gauge points recovered per second

paGaugeRecoverDelayTimeSec.Wiki: Delay before PA recovery begins after damage, in seconds

paRecoverGaugePoint.Wiki: The value at which PA can be reactivated after its destruction.

isUseDeadChrCapsule.Wiki: Does the character leave hit capsule after death?

isPulseSpAtkGuard.Wiki: Does the character's guarding method rely on pulse?

isNoBladeHomingHitTargetDirMove.Wiki: Do ACs not home in on this target with melees?

isRicochetNoResetResidualImpactSubTimer.Wiki: Do ricocheted projectiles not reset the accumulative impact timer?

isCurveLaserRiflePenetration.Wiki: Does the WLT 2nd-stage Coral attack pierce this entity?

isDispFlatLayer.Wiki: [PS5-EU-Graphics-D Ice Worm Defeat] - When performing a 'Retry Mission,' the worm will flash briefly at the start of the mission)

paGuardBaseDmypolyId.Wiki: Dummy poly used for projected Pulse Armor

paTurnOnSfxId.Wiki: FXR emitted when Pulse Armor initially activates

paTurnOnSfxDmypoly.Wiki: Dummy poly used for the FXR emitted on initial PA activation

paOnSfxId.Wiki: FXR emitted while Pulse Armor is active passively

paOpen_PaDecayCutRate.AltName: Pulse Armor Decay Reduction Rate On Deployment
paOpen_PaDecayCutRate.Wiki: PA decay reduction immediately after PA deployment

paOpen_PerfStayTimeSec.Wiki: The time that the entity's PA deployment state will last

paOpen_PerfRecastTimeSec.Wiki: In seconds. Time until PA transitions to the deployment state after activating PA

paGaugeRecoverEmerDelayTimeSec.Wiki: The amount of PA gauge points removed per second immediately after deploying a PA

paGaugeOpenSubPointPerSec.Wiki: In seconds. The time from when the PA gauge falls below 0 (PA is broken) until the gauge starts to recover

receiveDamageDirTypeForStopBullet.AltName: Damage Direction Type From Stationary Bullet
receiveDamageDirTypeForStopBullet.Wiki: Damage direction type when receiving damage from a stationary bullet, such as an explosion

completelyInvisibleMaxCheckDistance.Wiki: Distance for seeing completely-covered enemies through walls or overhangings

paEmerGaugeRecoverPointPerSec.Wiki: PA Gauge recovery amount per second in an emergency state

bPaOpenGaugeRecoverDelay.AltName: Apply Recovery Delay To Pulse Armor During Deployment
bPaOpenGaugeRecoverDelay.Wiki: Whether to apply a gauge recovery delay during deployment

paOpenGaugeRecoverScale.Wiki: Multiplies PA recovery speed by this amount during deployment period

criticalDefSfxMaterial.Wiki: SFX material when hit with a critical hit

openingDeadForceHide.Wiki: Is the entity forcibly hidden when reproducing death?

openingDeadDefaultVisible.Wiki: Death replay settings when set to default in the Map Editor

staggerCriticalRate.Wiki: Coefficient for reducing the cut rate when staggered

RicochetedDistRate.Wiki: Multiplies the distance at which ricochet occurs

hacking_RecoverDelayTimeSec.Wiki: Delay until hacking progress begins to decay after exiting access range

hacking_RecoverValPerSec.Wiki: Rate at which hacking progress decays after exiting access range

bRicochetedDistOverwrite.Wiki: Directly overwrites ricochet distance for all weapons

wepPoseAddAnimDefaultSlot.Wiki: Weapon posture addition - default number for addition

bPredictionUpdateNoSkip.Wiki: Whether to maintain the accuracy of predictive fire even when updating with omissions

doCutNaviByBoundingBox.Wiki: If TRUE, the navmesh will be silhouetted by this character's bounding box (only for characters who cannot move and whose hits remain even after death)

RicochetedDistOverwriteDist.Wiki: In meters. Ricochet distance to be corrected

defeatOsReinfExp.Wiki: Experience points gained to strengthen your OS upon death

updateActivatePriority.Wiki: Used to determine activation and update levels. The larger this is, the less the update level will decrease even if the player is farther away.

attenuationVariationId.Wiki: ID to specify to change the audible distance of the entity's SE

guardImpactCutRatePercent.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Impact taken when this character is guarding.

justGuardReloadTimeSec.Wiki: Initial Guard reactivation time when guarding
